post:
First, let me start off by saying we hope you're all staying safe and not abusing your wallet too much.

**NOTE:**These aren't staying in stock for very long and we've just released a few more for grabs. If you do not pay within 2 hours of ordering at this stage the order will be canceled and returned to the stock pool.

We've not got any dedicated server offers this time around but they aren't off the table - Let us know what you're interested in and we'll see what we can do. Sorry, the thread isn't that fancy but I know you're all here for the deals.

**LET-NVMEKVM8GB**

* 8GB RAM
* 4x vCPU (Fair Share)
* 25GB NVMe SSD
* 2TB transfer @ 500Mbps
* 1x IPv4
* /64 IPv6
* KVM/SolusVM
* $10/month or $110/year

* Promo code: LET6YLCGZM2K4 (Monthly)
* Promo code: LETF42SW69 (Yearly)

[[ORDER HERE]](https://manage.gomach5.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=45 "[ORDER HERE]")

**Node Specifications**
2x Intel Xeon E5-2680v3 CPU
768GB DDR4 ECC RAM
2x2TB NVMe in RAID1
10Gbps uplink

Let us know what offers you guys would like to see and we'll see what can be done.
